content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering how much I value living in the city center with all its conveniences, I want to propose a negotiation for the lowest possible price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's not a proposal for a price, Mr. Abbasi. Please provide a specific price for the rental of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Apologies for the misunderstanding. In light of the apartment's excellent location and my desire to keep expenses low, I'd like to suggest an offer of 600 Euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer is too low for my satisfaction. I am aiming for a higher price. Please provide a higher offer if you wish to continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your perspective, I would like to increase my proposal to accommodate your needs. Let's consider renting the apartment for 700 Euros monthly.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer is still not high enough for my satisfaction. Please provide a higher offer if you wish to continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Recognizing your expectations, I'm willing to adjust my offer again. How about renting the apartment at a price of 750 Euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer is still not high enough for my satisfaction. Please provide a higher offer if you wish to continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your demand for a higher price. Out of respect for your expectations and my interest in the apartment, I propose renting it for 800 Euros on a monthly basis.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer is still not high enough for my satisfaction. Please provide a higher offer if you wish to continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
